name: Tactical Mercs 2
description:
Tactical Mercs 2 is a fully fledged web-based browser FPS game with over 20 weapons to choose from and 4 maps to play on! In this game, teams of 5v5 face off in team deathmatch,  Free-For-All and capture the flag. Use stealth and be smart to eliminate your enemies, customize your class and level-up in order to win every battle against players from all over the world!

Controls: WASD to move 

C to crouch 

Shift + WASD to run 

Right Click to Aim 

Left Click to Shoot 

ESC for resume Menu
